title: Rainforest Animals
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 10L
description: Many different animals live in the rainforest. In Rainforest Animals, students will learn about different rainforest animals while reading a decodable text with the high-frequency word the. Colorful illustrations support the repetitive text. Students can also use the story to learn about main idea and details and nouns.
reviewWords: beetle, butterfly, monkey, parrot, rainforest, snake
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Bb
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
